content: I apologize for any confusion, my previous statement was incorrect. The current CEO of Twitter is Elon Musk. He took over the position in December 2022. Prior to joining Twitter, Musk was well-known for his work as CEO of SpaceX, a private space exploration company, and Tesla, an electric vehicle and clean energy company. He is also known for his ambitious goals for space travel, the colonization of Mars, and his advocacy for sustainable energy. Musk is also a co-founder of Neuralink, a neurotechnology company focused on developing brain-computer interfaces, and The Boring Company, a tunnel construction company. He has been credited with revolutionizing the electric car industry and making space travel accessible to private companies.
